modName: Thorin Oakenshield Companion and Armor LOTR The hobbit
summary: Adds thorin oakenshield as a companion. Fully armored with new stand alone armor which you can use too :)
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1300.photobucket.com/albums/ag88/scottaiel/thorinport_zpsc372287e.png[/IMG]

This adds two major things !! 

1 _ Custom Thorin\'s armor stand alone 
2_ Completely armored Thorin Oakenshield companion 

--- Stats and abilities ? You\'ll find him at lvl 20. Raise in lvl with you till 81 

   - Strong and brave warrior. The king under the mountain !!! 
   - Go Slay dragons with him ! You wont be disappointed with his strengh and courage

--- Where do I find him ? Near Riverwood\'s Bridge

[IMG]http://i1300.photobucket.com/albums/ag88/scottaiel/require_zps8637995e.png[/IMG]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachi Hair latest version[/url]
Skyrim Last Update 
[IMG]http://i1300.photobucket.com/albums/ag88/scottaiel/thorinimag_zpsa681df32.jpg[/IMG]

--- How Do I obtain the armor ? You just need to trade things with Thorin, he will give you the armor for you to enjoy :) Don\'t panic, he is a wise man, he has two armor sets just in case you need one !!!!
*Also featured in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28522]The Uruk hai Wars[/url]


*Credits to lordturgon for his awesome retexture ^^
*Credits to Nexus Site for having such a strong build community
*Credits to Bethesda for creating the best game ever
author: Scotaiel
